FuncDef: This command displays traffic forward statistics for the specified tunnel-type on the specified ISA.

ParaDef.Info: Displays the type of the tunnel. Values-gre, ip-in-ip, l2tpv3.
Displays the type of breakdown counter. Values-bidir-pkts, bidir-kbs, encap-pkts, encap-kbs, decap-pkts, decap-kbs.
